headline: A Fresh Look at Vistra (VST) Valuation After Strong One-Year Shareholder Returns
summary: Vistra (VST) shares recently caught attention as investors considered the company’s recent performance alongside its latest returns. In the past year, the stock climbed 63%, giving shareholders reason to review what is driving these gains. See our latest analysis for Vistra. Momentum for Vistra has been impressive, with a strong 63% one-year total shareholder return and a 34.6% share price return year-to-date. These results signal growing bullish sentiment. Recent gains suggest investors are...

headline: Should You Consider Vistra After Its 34% Surge in 2025?
summary: Trying to decide what to do with your Vistra shares, or wondering if now is the right time to get in? You are not alone. Vistra’s stock has been anything but boring this year, holding steady over the last week, down a couple percentage points in the past month, but still up a jaw-dropping 34.6% year-to-date. Zoom out further and the numbers are even more dramatic: a 63.4% gain in the past year, 821.7% over three years, and an incredible 1197.5% across the last five. That kind of performance...

headline: XLU: Cut Your Utility Investments
summary: Utilities Select Sector SPDR Fund is up 20.7% in 2025 with high valuations and rising risk. Learn why XLU ETF is a sell.
